name: @pojntfx/unisockets
description: A universal Berkeley sockets implementation for both WebAssembly (based on WebRTC) and native platforms with bindings for C, Go and TinyGo.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn build:lib && yarn build:app:node && yarn build:app:web
scripts.build:app:node: parcel build --target nodeApp cmd/unisockets_runner/main.ts && chmod +x dist/nodeApp/main.js
scripts.build:app:web: mkdir -p dist/webApp out && cp -r out dist/webApp && parcel build --target webApp cmd/unisockets_runner_web/index.html
scripts.build:protocol: mkdir -p dist/media && puml generate --svg protocol.puml -o dist/media/sequence.svg
scripts.build:docs: mkdir -p dist/docs && typedoc --tsconfig tsconfig.json --mode file --outDir dist/docs --out dist/docs --media dist/media --exclude '+(node_modules|dist)' .
scripts.dev:app:node:example-server: LOG_LEVEL=debug DEBUG='' ts-node-dev --files cmd/unisockets_runner/main.ts --runBinary true --useC true --useWASI true --binaryPath out/c/echo_server.wasm
scripts.dev:app:node:example-client: LOG_LEVEL=debug DEBUG='' ts-node-dev --files cmd/unisockets_runner/main.ts --runBinary true --useC true --useWASI true --binaryPath out/c/echo_client.wasm
scripts.dev:app:web: mkdir -p dist/webApp out && cp -r out dist/webApp && parcel --hmr-port 1235 --target webApp cmd/unisockets_runner_web/index.html

author: Felicitas Pojtinger <felicitas@pojtinger.com>
